author: gabrielaxel
title: Pathform: Custom growth paths
description: O bem-estar pode ser prático e direcionado. Entretanto, o bem-estar é tratado como um estilo de vida e não se aplica à solução de questões práticas ou globais.

f6_assessments.q0: When dealing with artificial intelligence it is of importance to be aware of your own consciousness. The proposal specifically mentions 'existencial risk' as a problem that needs mitigating and aims to do so by means of a mobile app containing micro-exercices that can be performed pretty much anywhere, anytime. For those interested, it can cause an influx of community members on both ecosystems along with an increased number of transactions. Being the first, and to my knowledge only one, in the space developing something like this creates opportunity to monopolise.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer is known in the SingularityNet's ecosystem and has a video series which facilitates SingularityNet's community members to perform consciousness sessions. Expanding this to a mobile application is a logical next step in terms of project expansion.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal is remarkably detailed. All factors have been covered and there was an elaborate risk analysis included, which is quite rare to encounter in funding proposals. 
However lengthy, the proposal did not specify to what extent this field is actual hardcore science and what is pseudo-scientific mindfulness. Unlike indicated in the proposer's checklist, the exact launch date is still TBD.

f6_assessments.q0: The purpose of this proposal is to address the fact that wellbeing practices are perceived to be a lifestyle with high costs associated with them, I believe that this proposal is relevant to the community, since that even though wellbeing practices are becoming more popular, only a minority of those societies can actually afford them. This proposal is expected to result in the following within a year: (1) an increase in Cardano transactions (2) 750-1000 users of the application. Last, but not least, I wish to congratulate the team on bringing Catalyst and the Cardano community this remarkable proposal that combines the requirements for world-class wellbeing practices with the benefits of SingularityNET and the strength of the Cardano community. I will give the proposal a score of 4 because I believe that reaching 1000 users in a range of one year seems to me to be a very conservative estimate considering that they are asking for 18% of the total budget for this challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: It is my belief that they have an experienced team with the necessary skills and experience to implement the proposal, as well as the necessary references to validate it. In addition to the founding members and advisors, I am confident that the team can deliver what they set out to do. I consider the budget to be adequate and very well organized. I believe that the proposed schedule is very appropriate with clear and achievable deliverables within the proposed timeframe.
f6_assessments.q2: We know what will happen in each phase of the proposal, and the actions associated with each phase are clearly outlined. We can, for instance, examine the activities that the team plans to undertake to build community. We also get to know what success looks like and what occurs within it. The success metrics presented are in line with what the proposer is looking for.

f6_assessments.q0: A fascinating glimpse of what AI is capable of is what the proposer is suggesting. Be creating a mobile app with AI-given tasks that nurtures the customer's wellbeing is a unique way of helping people. By using SN marketplace you increase the use-cases for SN and simultaneously provide influx to the Cardano Blockchain. This proposal is impressive and fits the challenge very well.
f6_assessments.q1: The team behind this proposal is the best I've seen. With an impeccable team is this they are surely possible to develop this. Regarding the detailed plan of the proposal, I like the way they handle this. Everything is well explained and follows a logical order. We see a definition of success that is reasonable, a perfect roadmap. The only thing that could make this better is a bit more in-depth explanation of the budget. We get the different sections where funding is needed but no actual numbers on people unless a developer is making $10.000 a month.
f6_assessments.q2: As stated in the above rationale the proposal is very well detailed. We have all aspects to assess the progressing of the proposal. We even get a risk analysis which is rare in a proposal but it should be a given.

f6_assessments.q0:
This is cool! It is hard to imagine a project that has a better fit to the challenge than this one. It provides a solid link between Cardano and SingularityNET, and articulates a clear role for AI. 

Exploring consciousness is a worthy endeavor, and the Pathform approach of micro-interventions super-interesting, and with a strong basis in both science and spiritual / meditative practice. It is certainly uncertain where this exploration will lead, but that is inherent to this type of endeavor! Using AI to recognize the effectiveness of consciousness interventions is also a good idea, and using AI developers as an initial user base is clever.

A random connection -- I wrote a novel that proposes (as a plot device) an app that has a lot of similarity to Pathform. It is very cool to see my fiction move toward reality!
f6_assessments.q1:
The long-term journey to do what Pathform proposes is highly uncertain. But the idea starting by spending 3 months on building a prototype app is a reasonable first step, and the plan presented suggests that it is highly likely that this can be implemented successfully.

The Pathform senior team also appears extremely strong, and intimately connected to SingularityNET. A team for this project needs to be hired, but there is good reason to expect that it will be possible to hire a strong team, given the high interest that the proposal will generate, the profile of SingularityNET and the budget.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal includes a fairly detailed overall roadmap for the Pathform application, and a good set of KPIs for 6 months and beyond. However, there is no specificity about what the prototype application will deliver during the 3-month period funded by this proposal. Therefore, I agree but do not strongly agree that there is sufficient information to audit the success of the proposal.

solution: Consciência de Precisão: intervenções direcionadas e personalizadas; caminhos de crescimento personalizados guiados pela IA e ação colaborativa para tratar de questões globais
experience: Fundador: PhD, cognição humana e ética da IA, anteriormente SingularityNET Head of People; inovação em governança descentralizada; especialista em consciência
